delegate void Alaris.Irc.Delegates.Server.NickErrorEventHandler ( string  badNick,
string  reason 
)

Called when a nick change fails.

This method can be called under 2 conditions: It can arise when the user is already registered with the IRC server and is trying change his nick. Or when the user is trying to register for the first time with the IRC server and it fails.

Note that if the later arises then you will have to manually complete the regsitration process.

Parameters:
badNick The nick which caused the problem
reason A message explaining the error
See also:
Listener.OnNickError

delegate void Alaris.Irc.Delegates.Server.RawMessageReceivedEventHandler ( string  message  ) 

The full unparsed text messages received from the IRC server. It includes all messages received except for those exchanged during a DCC chat.

Parameters:
message The text received.

Connection.OnRawMessageReceived

delegate void Alaris.Irc.Delegates.Server.RawMessageSentEventHandler ( string  message  ) 

The full unparsed text messages sent to the IRC server. It includes all messages sent except for those exchanged during a DCC chat.
